txt.en: 'The number of wounded have been so great that the Houses of Healing have run short of some basic supplies. Have you time to forage about Minas Tirith, [placeholder]? We are in need of clean cloths for bandaging and bittercap moss for cleaning wounds. If you are able to gather these things, you should leave them in one of the supply bins in the High Hall, House of Remedies, or House of Rest.'
Place the supplies in a supply bin
Scour Minas Tirith for clean cloths and bittercap moss.
The Houses of Healing are running low on basic supplies needed to treat the wounded.
'We are resupplied with clean cloths and bittercap? That is a great relief. You have my thanks!'
Torchún can be found outside the Houses of Healing on the Sixth Circle of Minas Tirith.\n\nYou should return to Torchún and let him know the supply bins have been replenished.
Place the supplies you have gathered in a supply bin in either the High Hall, House of Remedies, or House of Rest, on the Sixth Circle of Minas Tirith.
Placed the supplies in a supply bin
